title: Veigar Broken
body:
i think veigar should be reworked because he is just broken.

In my last game of league there was a veigar who had 2118 ap i couldnt do anything against him he just one-shots me, so i think it would be a great idea to downgrade veigar. His passiv is just so strong.

replies.body: Veigar is fine, a better question is who spectacularly fed him until he had 2118 AP..

Literally any champion with AP Scaling would be an issue at 2118 AP.

You're bad. Get over it. Don't QQ for nerfs.
He's not broken, as he's got lots of weaknesses. It sure is annoying when your team feeds him and then he 1 shots your front line tho.
Veigar is an easy champ to defeat if you understand him and your noob team does not feed him.
Are you bronze, silver, gold low plat by any chance?
